markdown:
<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Standard">[Osirionologist](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=77)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 58 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Region** Golden Road

</column>

Whether you’re a fascinated outsider or a local proud of your nation’s storied past, you’re a devoted student of Osirion’s history. You might be a traveling professor, a member of a society like the Pathfinders or the Esoteric Order of the Palatine Eye, or even a simple tomb robber cashing in on the glories of the past.

Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Constitution
or Intelligence, and one is a free ability boost.

You're trained in the [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) skill, and the [Ancient Osirion Lore](/skills/lore) skill. You gain the [Oddity Identification](/Feats.aspx?ID=817) skill feat.
name: Osirionologist

text: Osirionologist Source World Guide pg. 58 2.0 Region Golden Road Whether you’re a fascinated outsider or a local proud of your nation’s storied past, you’re a devoted student of Osirion’s history. You might be a traveling professor, a member of a society like the Pathfinders or the Esoteric Order of the Palatine Eye, or even a simple tomb robber cashing in on the glories of the past. Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Constitution or Intelligence, and one is a free ability boost. You're trained in the Occultism skill, and the Ancient Osirion Lore skill. You gain the Oddity Identification skill feat.
